item.title: USDC Treasury Mints Over 64.45M USDC on Ethereum
item.description: On August 8th, as monitored by Whale Alert, the USDC Treasury minted an extra 64,457,620 USDC on the Ethereum blockchain, which is approximately equivalent to $64,441,957.

item.title: Trump and Putin are scheduled to hold a meeting next weekend
item.description: On August 9th, as per CNBC, it is scheduled that Trump and Putin will hold a meeting in the upcoming weekend. The specific details have not been confirmed yet. (Golden Ten)

item.title: Coinbase: DEX Trading Feature Now Live on App and Begins Rollout to Select US Users
item.description: On August 9th, Coinbase announced that the DEX trading feature has been launched on the app and is available to some U.S. users (excluding those in New York state). This feature enables automatic liquidity matching through DEX aggregators like Aerodrome and Uniswap, and Coinbase sponsors the network fees. Transactions need to utilize an integrated self-custodial wallet.Coinbase will incrementally add support for new DEX assets in batches and gradually expand its services in the coming weeks, ultimately supporting all assets in the Base Layer ecosystem.

item.title: 「Crypto Big Brother」 Huang Lizheng Turns Ethereum Longs from Loss to Profit, Currently Holding over $3.6 Million in Unrealized Gains
item.description: On August 8th, on-chain data indicates that with the increase of Ethereum, the 25x leveraged long position of "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licai in Ethereum has gone from a loss to a profit. Currently, the unrealized gain is more than $3.6 million. On the other hand, his 5x PUMP long position is still in an unrealized loss of nearly $500,000.

item.title: A whale has once again withdrawn $7.84 million worth of ETH after ETH surpassed $4,000. In the past 24 hours, a total of 3356.78 ETH has been withdrawn.
item.description: On August 8th, according to the monitoring of on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), address 0x46d...c35cf withdrew 1999 ETH from Binance after ETH broke through $4000, and the value was $7.84 million.In the past 24 hours, they have withdrawn 3356.78 ETH from CEX (with a total value of $13.02 million), and the average price was $3925.5.

item.title: Trump Plans to Push Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac IPO Within the Year, Aiming to Raise $30 Billion
item.description: On August 8th, as reported by The Wall Street Journal, Trump is getting ready to urge Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to carry out their initial public offerings (IPOs) by 2025. He intends to raise $30 billion and aims for a valuation of $500 billion, which may potentially become the largest IPO in history.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Drops Below $116,000
item.description: On August 8th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $116,000 and is currently trading at $115,973.58, with a 24-hour decline of 0.61%.

item.title: Phi On-chain Identity System to Launch Coin in September
item.description: On August 8th, according to official information, the on-chain identity system Phi is scheduled to launch its coin in September, and the code is designated as PHI.Last November 5th, the on-chain identity system Phi announced the completion of a new round of strategic financing. This round of financing was led by Neoclassic Capital, with participation from Decima Fund, Cyber, PAKA Fund, and Incubate Fund.This is Phi's second round of financing after a $2 million seed round led by ChapterOne and Delphi Digital in 2022. The new financing will be utilized to construct a decentralized authentication system dedicated to on-chain identity.Phi was established in January 2022 and launched its first product, Phi Land, a social metaverse that visualizes on-chain activities on ENS and was designed by pixel artist eBoy.

item.title: Analysis: If we use past cycles to predict this bull run, we should focus on the accelerated upward trend between Q3 of this year and Q1 of next year.
item.description: On August 8th, in response to the question of "In which stage of the cycle is the crypto market currently in?", Diwan from CoinDesk Data pointed out that historically, the most significant price appreciation of Bitcoin occurred between the 500th and 720th days after the halving. Diwan mentioned that in the 2016 and 2020 cycles, Bitcoin reached its peak within this time window. "If this pattern repeats, then we should be attentive to a possible accelerated rise between the third quarter of 2025 and the beginning of the first quarter of 2026. Compared to the post-halving periods, the price trend of this cycle has been notably more subdued."On the other hand, Hougan from Bitwise Asset Management stated that the four-year cycle has ended, but for it to be formally declared dead, Bitcoin would need to perform well in 2026, which he anticipates will happen. In a comment via email, Hougan said, "I don't think we have eliminated volatility, but I think, first, the forces that historically dr

item.title: The Hong Kong Monetary Authority reminds to beware of false stablecoin promotions and reiterates that sales must be conducted by licensed providers.
item.description: August 8th - As of today, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) has issued a statement cautioning that in recent times, there have been criminals imitating the HKMA logo to promote the sales of stablecoins. The HKMA has once again emphasized that since the implementation of the Stablecoin Law on August 1st, the sales of stablecoins must be carried out by licensed stablecoin issuers, corporations holding a Type 1 license from the Securities and Futures Commission, virtual asset trading platforms, banks, or holders of stored value facility licenses. Currently, virtual asset over-the-counter trading institutions are not among the licensed providers.The HKMA reminds the public that if they purchase unlicensed stablecoins through unregulated channels, they must assume the associated risks.
